original_text: For I know how rebellious and stiff-necked you are. If you have been rebellious against the Lord while I am still alive and with you, how much more will you rebel after I die!
korean_text: 내가 너희의 반역함과 목이 곧은 것을 아나니 오늘 내가 살아서 너희와 함께 있어도 너희가 여호와를 거역하였거든 하물며 내가 죽은 후의 일이랴

sentences.original_text: how rebellious and stiff-necked you are
If you have been rebellious against the Lord
while I am still alive and with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아직 살아서 너희와 함께 있을 동안에

sentences.original_text: how much more will you rebel
